p: Although most polyomaviruses (PyVs) have been associated with different types of tumors, two recently discovered polyomaviruses of the genus Betapolyomavirus, WUPyV and KIPyV, have been found in respiratory samples worldwide, most frequently in samples from immunocompromised patients. While both alpha- and betapolyomaviruses may infect humans, gamma- and deltapolyomaviruses do not ( Babakir-Mina et al., 2013).
